GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.10.146
GSD.description:
gpiolib: cdev: Set lineevent_state::irq after IRQ register successfully

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.146 by commit 657803b918e097e47d99d1489da83a603c36bcdd, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit 468242724143a8e732f82f664b1e77432d149618. For more details please see the references link.
